name: movie-list-imdb
description: Go inside client folder and run 'npm install' followed by 'npm start' Go inside server folder and run 'npm install' followed by 'npm run local'

scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
